title: A Holiday in South India
creator_credit: Jagat Murari, Ezra Mir and Documentary Films of India
brief_description: A family is seen holidaying in South India. Shows the hotels, street scenes, shopping facilities, handwoven fabrics and souvenirs obtainable; trips to places of interest.
